actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To amend section 1821(a)(1) of title 12, United States Code, to raise the maximum Federal deposit insurance coverage to $200,000.
short_title: Individual Depositor and Community Bank Protection Act of 2008

summary.text: Individual Depositor and Community Bank Protection Act of 2008 - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to increase from $100,000 to $200,000 the standard maximum deposit insurance amount for bank deposits.

titles.title: Individual Depositor and Community Bank Protection Act of 2008
To amend section 1821(a)(1) of title 12, United States Code, to raise the maximum Federal deposit insurance coverage to $200,000.
